definitions.definition: The act of reprobating ; the state of being reprobated; strong disapproval , reproof or censure .
The predestination of a certain number of the human race as reprobates , or objects of condemnation and punishment ; damnation .

main_definition: The act of reprobating ; the state of being reprobated; strong disapproval , reproof or censure .
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) The predestination of a certain number of the human race as reprobates , or objects of condemnation and punishment ; damnation .
